value:
$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Kvasir, wait!$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|I...will not listen to anything you have
to say. We are enemies.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Please, Kvasir... I see in you none
of Gullveig's cold influence.$k$pI have no wish to fight you...$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|We...have no choice but to fight.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|No! The future can still be changed!$k$pIf you can change what lies within
your heart—if you can refuse the
future where you become Gullveig...$k$pI believe we can all live in peace.$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|That is not possible. Not for me.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|I will not give up on you, Kvasir!
As long as we hold on to our hope—$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|"...its light will not fade; it will remain,
living on in your heart." These words
are not new to me.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE13_08,0|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What is it, Seiðr?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|"As long as you hold on to your hope,
its light will not fade; it will remain,
living on in your heart..."$k$pI have held those words in my heart
for what feels like forever...$k$pI suddenly wonder when it was
that I first heard them...$k$pAnd...how it is that Kvasir has heard
the exact same words.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$Sbs150|
